name: Chronoblink
description:
What's your highest score?

CONTROLS

  • WASD or arrows to move and jump.
  • SPACE or CTRL to toggle slow-mo.
  • LEFT CLICK to shoot teleporter.
  • RIGHT CLICK to teleport.
  • ESCAPE / F10 to toggle menu.
  • F11 to toggle fullscreen.

HOW TO PLAY

  • Teleport into enemies to earn points, but don't let them touch you!
  • Be careful, your points are only saved EVERY 10 SECONDS. If you get hit before then, the points are SUBTRACTED from your score!
  • Use slow-mo to improve your precision, but don't waste too much time!
  • Earn more points by hitting multiple enemies in quick succession. See if you can get a 10x multiplier!

CREDITS

  • Programming: Ben Barsdell
  • Art: Ben Barsdell
  • Music and sound effects: Ben Barsdell
  • Made using Godot, JFXR, LMMS, Audacity, Aseprite.
  • Uses the 2D Navmesh Generator plugin by Samuel Bigos: https://github.com/samuelbigos/godot_2d_navmesh_generator
